com.andray.material.category

Class CategoryServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andray.material.category.CategoryServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CategoryService

    @Service
public class CategoryServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CategoryService

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CategoryServiceImpl() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCategory(Category category)
      This method is used to save the @param category by calling save methof of jpa repository.
      void deleteCategory(java.lang.Long id)
      This method is used to delete the category with the help of id.At first, we examine weather the mentioned category is present in database or not by executing the method getCategoryById ,in the case of absence then the method throw the exception otherwise the next deletion method is operated.
      java.util.List<Category> getAllCategory()
      This method is used to get all the categories from the database and return the result in the form of list by calling the method find all of the JPA repository which is extended by the interface Category Repository.
      Category getCategoryById(java.lang.Long id)
      This method is used to return the category according to the mentioned id in @param which return category through the method findBYId of Jpa repository extended by the CategoryRepository.
      void updateCategory(Category category)
      This is used to update the existing category by new category.
